blog.name: shima-draws
blog.title: only in the darkness can you see the stars
blog.description:
★Art tag★
-DO NOT REPOST MY ART-★Navigate★
★Among the Stars★
Hey-yo! Nice to meet you! You can all call me Shima! I'm just a lame ol' college graduate who arts for her own entertainment. Basically this is a dorky blog that contains all my silly art and stories, so feel free to look around. My ask box is always open, so please don't hesitate to come ask me about anything you'd like! (In fact, I encourage it!)

tags: GLADION JUST WANTS TO SAVE HIS BF HHHDBDB
Aaaaa it’s so heartbreaking but so good...
summary: When we were streaming Pokemon last night I brought up the idea of Ash being taken into the Ultra Wormhole instead of Lusamine,...
body:
When we were streaming Pokemon last night I brought up the idea of Ash being taken into the Ultra Wormhole instead of Lusamine, and Wandi and Kit nearly killed me for the comment lmfao

But just imagine!! Especially Gladion’s reaction since Ash jumps in front of him to protect him so he feels soooo guilty and is hardcore freaking out and worrying for Ash’s safety, Pikachu was left behind too so they sorta become each other’s comfort while Gladion’s like “I’m sorry I’m sorry I’m sorry I let your trainer be captured like this I’m SO sorry”

Just Gladion pretty much having a panic attack and Lillie having to calm him down when he’s like, “We have to do something we have to save him please Lillie we have to go after him I can’t stay here waiting anymore!!” And she’s like “It’s okay, just calm down” And Lusamine sorta takes Ash’s place when they all go to Vast Poni Canyon and they have some good family bonding while Gladion tries to save his boyfriend from certain doom

And the best part is when they get into the Ultra Space they see Ash has merged with Nihilego like Lusamine did ^p^ It would be so badass tbh but also really sad cause Ash just keeps pushing them away like “I don’t want to hurt you!!” and Gladion chases and chases him and shouts “No matter what I’ll never stop following you, I won’t let you go!!” And it would be super interesting if Gladion and Pikachu pulled off the Z-Move together, like they’d bonded somehow while Ash was gone, and when they pull Ash out of the leftover poison goop from Nihilego he’s like “You saved me” and Gladion starts crying like “Y-yeah”

Aaaaa I really want to write about it now…!

summary: The Wonderful World of Monster Collection: Part 2, Pokemon
title: The Wonderful World of Monster Collection: Part 2, Pokemon
body:
The Wonderful World of Monster Collection: Part 2, Pokemon

Article by Orville E. Wright

Read the Introduction,  Part One

Hello again everyone, this is the next part of the Wonderful World of Monster Collection. This time, it will be on the benchmark of the genre: Pokémon.

Pokémonwas created in 1996 by the former gaming magazine, now super gaming company, Gamefreak. It was the invention of Satoshi Tajiri, the current director, and Ken Sugimori, the one…

blog.name: pokegodsandmissingno
blog.title: P̵o̵K̸é̴G̸o̸D̷s̸ and Frightful Things to Come?
blog.description: There is a growing desire and expectation of humans here on Earth in making full contact with PoKéMoN who are still unknown. Back in 1995, when I saw my first UPM (Unindexed Pocket Monster), I found out very quickly that other people thought you were totally crazy if you said you saw such things. The world has changed quite a bit since then when I was a child. In fact, in late 1997, a poll taken in Kanto shows that for the first time ever, more than fifty percent of residents now believe in PokéGODS's. Since then, there have been polls that put the figure at over eighty percent or more.

summary: (via 🌟🍒mint🍒🌟 (@mintxdrop) | Twitter)

blog.name: inikavulpixelreviews
blog.title: Let's Talk About Pokemon!
blog.description:
Reviewing my personal opinion on every single Pokemon! Yes, all 809 of them!
(Mostly) Daily Uploads, 3 PM EST.

summary: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Shelmet and Accelgor
title: Let’s Talk About Pokemon - Shelmet and Accelgor
body:
616: Shelmet

And with much anticipation I’m sure, we’re finally at the rival Pokemon to Karrablast, who we’ve reviewed quite a bit ago. But it’s here now. We have… Shelmet. An unassuming little snail-like creature that, of all things, has a shell designed like a knight’s armor. But what an absolutely adorable idea that is! A pleasantly odd shape for a snail as well. I think I take slight issue with the “legs”, just because they seem to be part of the armor itself. But at least its animations acknowledge that and it looks kinda goofy tipping back and forth on really ineffective legs. Hah.

Personal Score: 8/10

Another good one!

617: Accelgor

Then comes Accelgor, the Pokemon that gets its shell stolen by that asshole beetle, resulting in a rather brooding and ninja-like snail creature that’s wrapped itself in rags. Let’s appreciate for a moment that one of the Pokemon most well known for having a ridiculously high speed stat is a snail.

And while that is fun in and of itself, sadly I feel like Accelgor falls just shy of Shelmet. It’s a weird critter that I can respect, but I feel like the design’s wrapped up with just a little less finesse than Shelmet. The racecar driver helmet stripes look rather out of place on it. And I think the lower half of the body just bugs me a smidge. I guess part of the idea is that it’s got a bit of a stunt driver look with the “helmet”, “scarf”, and the fullbody suit but. That could’ve been way more clear.

That said though, it’s a plenty enjoyably weird monster snail thing. I appreciate the general anime-like ninja aesthetic to counteract Excavalier’s more knightly appearance. Its eyes… seeming to be on the inside of its mouth is also an interesting tidbit about it. One of those things.

Personal Score: 8/10

Same score, but Shelmet just barely wins out over it.

Overall:

A nice pair to be sure. I prefer Excavalier in the end though.

[Archive]

[[MORE]]
